Grocery

Grocery Buddy is an app that helps shoppers get great deals on their grocery shopping at stores that are local to them. It's free, fast, and easy to use.

LiriBot

This LiriBot is like the Iphone's Siri. It is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface. This node.js app takes in parameters and gives back data. You ask it to do 3 things. "Concert-this", "Movie-this", "Spotify-this-song"

View Source Code
Node.js Axios
